plot outline: One night, while working at the Mumbai Police Emergency Call Centre, police officer Nikhil Sood gets a call from a hysterical woman who wants to commit suicide. Even as he tries to save her, Nikhil has no idea that it will lead to him endangering his own family as dark truths that he has been hiding threaten to destroy all that he loves and stands for.
title: Dial 100
plot: One night, while working at the Mumbai Police Emergency Call Centre, police officer Nikhil Sood gets a call from a hysterical woman who wants to commit suicide. Even as he tries to save her, Nikhil has no idea that it will lead to him endangering his own family as dark truths that he has been hiding threaten to destroy all that he loves and stands for.::Promita Mukherjee

Nikhil Sood gets a call on emergency helpline number dial 100 where a women threatens to commit suicide Nikhil asks for he details in order to help her bu the women hesitates saying she is soon going to die.Prerna wife of Nikhil alerts him that their son Dhruv could be back to old habits of being a drug peddler as he leaves home late night Nikhil makes Dhruv understand and return home quickly.But much before that the mysterious women who called Nikhil reaches his house and holds Prerna captive the women forces Prerna to sit in her car and calls Nikhil after having a second conversation he realizes that she is Seema Palav whose son died in hit an run case a rich Aman Mehra's car hit him the case got shut due to pressure from big wings but Dhruv also had a hand in it.Seema's motive is only to revenge on Aman which is the reason she has kidnapped Prerna and wants to Dhruv to get Aman to her.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
